item.description:
We are actively recruiting for new members who would like to participate in the sport of DragonBoat racing. You'll get a great workout while preparing for the next race event.

Come on down and try it out. If you've never paddled before, no worries, we'll provide a paddle & PFD and show you all you need to know. You'll also meet an enthusiastic group of people who'll help guide you through practices and races.

We look forward to paddling with you.
item.how_to_find_us: Park behind the Ocean State Job Lot and follow the gravel path to the pavilion
item.name: GETTING PREPARED FOR OUR NEXT RACE EVENT
